name: Diglett
author: Keiji Kinebuchi
flavor_text: It burrows through the ground at a shallow depth. It leaves raised earth in its wake, making it easy to spot.

abilities.name: Submerge
abilities.effect: As long as this Pokémon is on your Bench, prevent all damage done to this Pokémon by attacks (both yours and your opponent’s).

attacks.name: Dig Through
attacks.effect: This attack does 30 damage to 1 of your opponent’s Benched Pokémon. (Don’t apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)
